description: '''Nederbeat''' (also: '''Nederbiet''') is a genre of rock music that began with the [[Netherlands|Dutch]] rock boom in the mid-1960s influenced by British [[Beat music|beat]] groups and rock bands such as [[the Beatles]] and [[the Rolling Stones]]. Among the best-known Nederbeat groups are the [[Golden Earring]], [[The Motions (band)|The Motions]], [[the Outsiders (Dutch band)|The Outsiders]] and [[Shocking Blue]].
